titles.title: A resolution to amend Senate Resolution 352, 99th Congress, relating to the commemoration of the Bicentennial of the Senate of the United States.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 9/30/1987--Introduced. Provides for the employment of staff by the Commission on the Bicentennial of the United States Senate.
